content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-85~-87)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (39.0,-85.0), and (37.0,-85.0)
- Storage chests at positions (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5), and (36.5,-86.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5) and (35.5,-85.5)
All components working together to mine and store coal

### Mixed Ore Mining & Smelting at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining copper and iron ore
- Storage chest at (-27.5,-59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0)
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) storing iron and copper plates

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-10~-6, y=-59)
Consists of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), and (-6.0,-59.0)
- Storage chests at positions (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Smelting Array at position(x=0~6, y=0)
Consists of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Burner inserters for input/output at corresponding positions

### Power Generation Complex at position(x=-3.5~4.5, y=17.5~27.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting water and steam
- Electric poles at (11.5,20.5) and (7.5,20.5)

# ERROR TIPS

### Extraction errors
- Cannot extract items from storage when the storage is empty or does not contain requested items
- Ensure target storage contains the items you want to extract before attempting extraction

### Belt blockage issues
- Clear blocked transport belts when inserters cannot place items due to full belts
- Ensure proper item flow by maintaining clear belt paths
